Veranstaltung
Certified Veterinary Balance Method Acupuncture Course
10. Januar 2022 - 18. Oktober 2022 | Webinar
Advanced Course (Prerequisite: TCVM Fundamental Theories or one session of veterinary acupuncture)
Learn an acupuncture method that immediately & effectively treats localized symptoms such as pain & numbness. This three-step strategy balances a whole meridian or sein & numbness. This three-step strategy balances a whole meridian or several meridians simultaneously using as little as four needles.
N.B!
The first on-site session on the 13-15.06.2022 with be held at the Q stables, Kisslegg, Germany, hosted by the Chi University Germany
The second on-site session on the 16-18.10.2022 with be held at the Domaine du Rhône, Bex, Switzerland
